readable.content: A bearded man wearing a denim jacket and a hat sits on a park bench A bearded man wearing a denim jacket sits on a bench . A man with a bushy beard and a baseball cap sits on a park bench . An old man with a long beard and jean jacket sits on a park bench . An old man with a long white beard , glasses , and a hat is sitting on a park bench .
